activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is the entry point for the app. It handles initialization tasks such as checking for the migration of favorite items and launching the main activity based on whether the app has been run before.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_property.effect: the main layout for directory navigation, which includes a SwipeRefreshLayout and a RecyclerView for displaying directories.
the menu for accessing app features like search, sorting, and settings.

activities.summary: The MainActivity serves as the primary interface for a gallery app, handling user interaction with media files, directory navigation, and configuration settings. It manages a grid layout of directories, provides options to change view types and column counts, and offers functionalities like searching, filtering, and managing media files.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.MediaActivity

dynamic_property.effect: houses the media browsing interface and its associated controls.
opens the menu with various options such as sorting, filtering, and managing the media view.

activities.summary: The MediaActivity provides a user interface for browsing and managing media files, including images and videos. It allows users to view media in a grid or list format, manage folders, delete or restore files, and perform operations such as setting a wallpaper. The activity also supports searching, filtering, and sorting media items, and provides options for customizing the user experience.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SearchActivity

dynamic_property.effect: Acts as the root layout for the activity, coordinating the positioning of other UI elements.
Opens the search menu with options for filtering and managing media files.
Holds the main content of the activity, such as the search input and media grid, and applies a scrolling behavior.

static_properties.text: No media files have been found with the selected filters.

dynamic_property.effect: Displays a message when no media files are found with the selected filters, initially hidden.
Provides a fast scrolling mechanism for the media grid, allowing users to quickly navigate through items.
Displays a grid of media items, and item clicks can open them or start a new activity depending on the media type.

Displays a grid of media items, and item clicks can open them or start a new activity depending on the media type.

activities.summary: The SearchActivity is designed to allow users to search and view media files within a gallery application. It includes functionality for searching, filtering, and displaying media files, as well as options to delete or manage files.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.ViewPagerActivity
activities.summary: The ViewPagerActivity is designed to display a collection of media files in a user-friendly interface. It supports operations such as starting a slideshow, viewing files, adjusting settings, and performing file management tasks like copying, moving, and deleting.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.AboutActivity
activities.summary: The AboutActivity is a part of the Simple Mobile Tools app, likely serving as a screen that provides information about the app, such as its version, author, and other relevant details.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.CustomizationActivity
activities.summary: The CustomizationActivity is designed to allow users to personalize various settings within the app, such as themes, colors, and sizes.
